   10: -compile(export_all).

   13:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   14:  %% Function: suite() -> Info
   15:  %% Info = [tuple()]
   16:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   17: 
   18: suite() ->
   19:      [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}].
   20: 
   21:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   22:  %% Function: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   23:  %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   24:  %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   25:  %% Reason = term()
   26:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   28:     % should be removed
   29:     {ok,S}=file:open("config.test",write),
   30:     lists:foreach(fun(X)->io:format(S,"~p~n",[X]) end, Config),
   31:     file:close(S),
   32:     ok=application:start(adder_service), 
   33:     Config.
   34: 
   35:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   36:  %% Function: end_per_suite(Config0) -> term() | {save_config,Config1}
   37:  %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   38:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   39: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   40:     ok=application:stop(adder_service),
   41:     ok=application:unload(adder_service),
   42:     ok.
   43: 
   44:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   45:  %% Function: init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   46:  %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   47:  %% GroupName = atom()
   48:  %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   49:  %% Reason = term()
   50:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   51: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
   52:   % should be removed
   53:     {ok,S}=file:open("group.test",write),
   54:     lists:foreach(fun(X)->io:format(S,"~p~n",[X]) end, GroupName),
   55:     file:close(S),
   56:      Config.
   57: 
   58:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   59:  %% Function: end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   60:  %%               term() | {save_config,Config1}
   61:  %% GroupName = atom()
   62:  %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   63:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   64: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   65:      ok.
   66: 
   67:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   68:  %% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   69:  %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   70:  %% TestCase = atom()
   71:  %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   72:  %% Reason = term()
   73:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   74: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   75:       % should be removed
   76:     {ok,S}=file:open("testCase.test",write),
   77:     lists:foreach(fun(X)->io:format(S,"~p~n",[X]) end, TestCase),
   78:     file:close(S),
   79:     Config.
   80:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   81:  %% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   82:  %%               term() | {save_config,Config1} | {fail,Reason}
   83:  %% TestCase = atom()
   84:  %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   85:  %% Reason = term()
   86:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   87: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   88:      ok.
   89: 
   90:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   91:  %% Function: groups() -> [Group]
   92:  %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
   93:  %% GroupName = atom()
   94:  %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
   95:  %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
   96:  %% TestCase = atom()
   97:  %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
   98:  %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
   99:  %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
  100:  %% N = integer() | forever
  101:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  102: groups() ->
  103:      [
  104:      % {generate, [uniform]}
  105:      ].
  106: 
  107:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  108:  %% Function: all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
  109:  %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  110:  %% GroupName = atom()
  111:  %% TestCase = atom()
  112:  %% Reason = term()
  113:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  114:  all() -> 
  115:     [add_ok_1
  116:  %    {group, generate}
  117:     ].
  118:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  119:  %% Function: TestCase() -> Info
  120:  %% Info = [tuple()]
  121:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  122: my_test_case() -> 
  123:   %  42=adder_service:add(20,22),
  124:     [].
  125: 
  126:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  127:  %% Function: TestCase(Config0) ->
  128:  %%               ok | exit() | {skip,Reason} | {comment,Comment} |
  129:  %%               {save_config,Config1} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
  130:  %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  131:  %% Reason = term()
  132:  %% Comment = term()
  133:  %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  134: add_ok_1(_Config) -> 
  135:     [42=adder_service:add(20,22)].
  136: %add_ok_1() -> 
  137:  %   [42=adder_service:add(20,22)].   
  138: 
  139: add_nok_1(_Config) -> 
  140:     glurk=adder_service:add(20,22).
